languages.text: {n}Солдат со вскриком падает. Его прежде симпатичное лицо уродует глубокая рана со рваными краями, половина уха оторвана, нос раздавлен и свернут на сторону. Вряд ли костоправ, услуги которого по карману Джасперу, сможет вернуть его лицу былую благовидность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Солдат со вскриком падает. Его прежде симпатичное лицо уродует глубокая рана со рваными краями, половина уха оторвана, нос раздавлен и свернут на сторону. Вряд ли костоправ, услуги которого по карману Феррику, сможет вернуть его лицу былую благовидность.{/n}

languages.text: {n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, and his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Солдат со вскриком падает. Его прежде симпатичное лицо уродует глубокая рана со рваными краями, половина уха оторвана, нос раздавлен и свернут на сторону. Вряд ли костоправ, услуги которого по карману Джасперу, сможет вернуть его лицу былую благовидность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His formerly handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely Jasper can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his former good looks.{/n}

{n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His formerly handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely Jasper can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his former good looks.{/n}

{n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

{n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

{n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, and his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

{n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, and his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Er sackt mit einem Schrei zu Boden. Sein einst so hübsches Gesicht wurde durch einen tiefen Schnitt entstellt, ihm fehlt ein halbes Ohr, seine Nase ist gebrochen und zu einer Seite verschoben. Jaspar kann sich vermutlich keinen Knochensäger leisten, der sein gutes Aussehen wiederherstellt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, and his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Er sackt mit einem Schrei zu Boden. Sein einst so hübsches Gesicht wurde durch einen tiefen Schnitt entstellt, ihm fehlt ein halbes Ohr, seine Nase ist gebrochen und zu einer Seite verschoben. Jaspar kann sich vermutlich keinen Knochensäger leisten, der sein gutes Aussehen wiederherstellt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il tombe à terre en poussant un cri. Son beau visage est désormais marqué d'une profonde entaille, il lui manque la moitié d'une oreille et son nez est écrasé, tordu sur le côté... Il y a peu de chances qu'il ait les moyens de payer un chirurgien capable de lui rendre son apparence d'origine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, and his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il tombe à terre en poussant un cri. Son beau visage est désormais marqué d'une profonde entaille, il lui manque la moitié d'une oreille et son nez est écrasé, tordu sur le côté... Il y a peu de chances qu'il ait les moyens de payer un chirurgien capable de lui rendre son apparence d'origine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他尖叫着，倒在地上。他原本英俊的脸已经彻底毁了，深深的伤口将他的脸一分为二。半只耳朵不见了，鼻子也被碾碎，扭到了一旁。贾斯帕恐怕拿不出足够的钱进行整骨手术，怕是再也恢复不了原本的样子了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, and his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他尖叫着，倒在地上。他原本英俊的脸已经彻底毁了，深深的伤口将他的脸一分为二。半只耳朵不见了，鼻子也被碾碎，扭到了一旁。贾斯帕恐怕拿不出足够的钱进行整骨手术，怕是再也恢复不了原本的样子了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}男は泣きながら地面に崩れ落ちる。かつてのハンサムな顔立ちは深い裂傷で歪み、耳の半分は欠け、鼻は押しつぶされて片側にねじ曲がっている。その美貌を取り戻せるために外科医に金を払う余裕など、ジャスパーにはなさそうだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, and his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男は泣きながら地面に崩れ落ちる。かつてのハンサムな顔立ちは深い裂傷で歪み、耳の半分は欠け、鼻は押しつぶされて片側にねじ曲がっている。その美貌を取り戻せすために外科医に金を払う余裕など、ジャスパーにはなさそうだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cae al suelo con un grito. Su rostro, antaño apuesto, ha quedado desfigurado por una profunda herida, le falta media oreja y tiene la nariz aplastada y torcida hacia un lado. Es improbable que Jaspar pueda permitirse el lujo de una operación capaz de devolverle su buen aspecto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, and his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cae al suelo con un grito. Su rostro, antaño apuesto, ha quedado desfigurado por una profunda herida, le falta media oreja y tiene la nariz aplastada y torcida hacia un lado. Es improbable que Jaspar pueda permitirse el lujo de una operación capaz de devolverle su buen aspecto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çığlıklar içinde yere kapaklanıyor. Bir zamanlar yakışıklı yüzünün şekli derin bir kesikle bozulmuş, kulağının yarısı yok ve burnu ezilip yana yatmış. Jaspar'ın elini yüzünü düzeltebilecek bir cerraha para yetirebilmesi pek olası değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He falls to the ground with a cry. His once-handsome face has been disfigured by a deep laceration, he is missing half an ear, and his nose is crushed and twisted to one side. It is unlikely that Jaspar can afford a sawbones capable of restoring his good looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Çığlıklar içinde yere kapaklanıyor. Bir zamanlar yakışıklı yüzünün şekli derin bir kesikle bozulmuş, kulağının yarısı yok ve burnu ezilip yana yatmış. Jaspar'ın elini yüzünü düzeltebilecek bir cerraha para yetirebilmesi pek olası değil.{/n}
